00023 #include <stdio.h>

00037 int ih_poll_buttons(void) {
00038         int temp = 0;
00039         
00040         if ((PINL & (1<<BUTTON1_TX_BIT)) == 0)
00041                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON1_TX_BIT);
00042 
00043         if ((PINL & (1<<BUTTON2_TX_BIT)) == 0)
00044                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON2_TX_BIT);
00045 
00046         if ((PINL & (1<<BUTTON3_TX_BIT)) == 0)
00047                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON3_TX_BIT);
00048 
00049         if ((PINL & (1<<BUTTON4_TX_BIT)) == 0)
00050                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON4_TX_BIT);
00051         
00052         if ((PINH & (1<<BUTTON1_RX_BIT)) == 0)
00053                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON1_RX_BIT);
00054         
00055         if ((PINH & (1<<BUTTON2_RX_BIT)) == 0)
00056                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON2_RX_BIT);
00057         
00058         if ((PINH & (1<<BUTTON3_RX_BIT)) == 0)
00059                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON3_RX_BIT);
00060         
00061         if ((PINB & (1<<BUTTON4_RX_BIT)) == 0)
00062                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON4_RX_BIT);
00063 
00064         if ((PINC & (1<<BUTTON_ROTATE_BIT)) == 0)
00065                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_ROTATE_BIT);
00066         
00067         if ((PINC & (1<<BUTTON_TXRX_BIT)) == 0)
00068                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_TXRX_BIT);
00069                 
00070         if ((PIND & (1<<BUTTON_RXANT_BIT)) == 0)
00071                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_RXANT_BIT);
00072                 
00073         if ((PIND & (1<<BUTTON_SUBMENU_BIT)) == 0)
00074                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_SUBMENU_BIT);
00075                 
00076         if ((PINK & (1<<BUTTON_MENU_BIT)) == 0)
00077                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_MENU_BIT);
00078                 
00079         if ((PING & (1<<BUTTON_PULSE_BIT)) == 0)
00080                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_PULSE_BIT);
00081 
00082         if ((PING & (1<<BUTTON_AUX1_BIT)) == 0)
00083                 temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_AUX1_BIT);
00084         
00085         if ((PING & (1<<BUTTON_AUX2_BIT)) == 0) {
00086                         temp |= (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_AUX2_BIT);
00087                         
00092                         DDRG |= (1<<BUTTON_AUX2_BIT);
00093                         PORTG |= (1<<BUTTON_AUX2_BIT);
00094                         
00095                         DDRG &= ~(1<<BUTTON_AUX2_BIT);
00096                         PORTG |= (1<<BUTTON_AUX2_BIT);
00097         }
00098         
00099         return(temp);
00100 }
00101 
00108 unsigned char ih_poll_ext_devices(void) {
00109         unsigned char temp = 0;
00110         
00111         if (PINE & (1<<EXT_FOOTSWITCH_BIT))
00112                 temp |= (1<<STATUS_FOOTSWITCH_BIT);
00113         
00114         if (PINE & (1<<EXT_RADIO_SENSE1_BIT))
00115                 temp |= (1<<STATUS_RADIO_SENSE1_BIT);
00116         
00117         if (PINJ & (1<<EXT_RADIO_SENSE2_BIT))
00118                 temp |= (1<<STATUS_RADIO_SENSE2_BIT);
00119         
00120         if (PINJ & (1<<EXT_USB1_DTR_BIT))
00121                 temp |= (1<<STATUS_USB1_DTR_BIT);
00122 
00123         if (PINJ & (1<<EXT_USB2_DTR_BIT))
00124                 temp |= (1<<STATUS_USB2_DTR_BIT);
00125 
00126         if (PINJ & (1<<EXT_USB2_RTS_BIT))
00127                 temp |= (1<<STATUS_USB2_RTS_BIT);
00128         
00129         return(temp);
00130 }
